Html:
When the mouse is over my Ribbon, and I use the mouse wheel to scroll, it scroll actually scrolls. Why?  It's an issue for me, because I hide the Administration Tab if someone isn't an Admin, but users that aren't Admins can scroll to the different options under Administration and use those options. NOT GOOD!

I made a very short video of what's happening: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gl1rpR4FlDI

Thanks for your help!

 

Brenda
I've just decided to hide all the buttons under the tab I'm hiding.
